dcterms:description: A configurable tree graph that encodes a partially observable MDP, where key decision points occur occasionally and are separated by confounding wait states.
dcterms:title: CT-graph Environment

dcterms:creator: M. Johnson
K. Hofmann
T. Hutton
D. Bignell
dcterms:description: An environment based on the game Minecraft, configured to create a labyrinth with junctions and long corridors, reflecting characteristics of confounding POMDP problems.
dcterms:title: MALMO Environment

dcterms:description: A platform used for reinforcement learning benchmarks, referenced in the context of standard input size for deep reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: ATARI platform

dcterms:description: Various reinforcement learning benchmarks including games like ViZDoom and control benchmarks like muJoCo, mentioned for comparison with other RL benchmarks.
dcterms:title: Various RL benchmarks

dcterms:description: A maze used as a future test for the proposed architecture, referenced in the context of reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Morrison water maze
